name: Tanks 3D (Web)
description:
A free 3D Tank fighting game inspired by Wii Play Tanks, where you progress through campaign levels and defeat enemy tanks with or against other players in the multiple multiplayer modes.

The web version has tons of bugs and less features than the full version: https://viper1618.itch.io/tanks-3d

Singleplayer
-Classic Campaign: All 100 levels of the Wii minigame.
-Regular Campaign: 50 custom-made, originally designed levels with new tanks and features.

Multiplayer
-FFA: Play with other players and/or bots in different maps.
-Co-Op: Play with others through either the Classic or Regular campaign.
-Teams: Play with other players and/or bots in teams on different maps.

Other Features
-Ability to play custom maps in multiplayer with others but no level editor.
-Boosts like missiles, grenades, rockets, extra speed, shields, and more in multiplayer.
